description: Irisviel von Einzbern is the heroine of the Fate/Zero story, the mother of Illyasviel von Einzbern and Kiritsugu`s wife. A homunculus prototype created by the Einzbern family with the idea to give birth to an ultimate homunculus. Like many of the Einzberns, she is skilled in alchemy. Irisviel serves as Saber`s proxy Master, since Kiritsugu believes that he and Saber are incompatible.
name: Irisviel von Einzbern
